11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);
, .

{ templateUrl: 'items.html' }

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl); 
  ,    .

 9.4 API  
    API ,      .   ‚Äì return,  .  ,     . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
       . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

    restrict ‚Äì     .        ,    'A'.         'E',  ‚Äì 'M'    ‚Äì 'C'. 
 
 9.4.2 replace 
    .    <some-directive></some-directive>   replace: true,          . 
 
 9.4.3 scope 
   $scope    ,    .    $scope    ,    .

     ,      .    controllerAs: 'something',          something.myMethod()

 11   
        .     Angular  API.        .         $digest. 
 
 11.1    
   ,    .     .filter().         . 
 
   ,    . 
 
 function myFilter () { return function () { //   }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter); 
 
       .          (  Angular    ). 
 
 function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase); 
 
 item     .     ,  :

 11.2    
         .   ,       . ,   ,   'A'. 
 
 function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA); 
 
    ng-repeat: 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
       : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
 something     : 
 
 function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { //     "items",   "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA); 
 
 11.3   
 
      .filter(),     ,     .   ,      this.namesStartingWithA,        ,   .      controllerAs. 
 function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl); 
 
     DOM  : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

      Angular,      :   Angular    .     ,    ,          URL.     ngRoute

     ,    ,  $routeProvider      .config().        .when(). 
 
 ,         ‚Äì    ¬´¬ª /inbox ,     .     .when()  ,   URL.   ‚Äì    .    .otherwise(),     . 
 
 function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router); 
 
       ,      . ,    inbox.html.

    .  Angular     controller  controllerAs. 
 
 $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); 
 
  ,       ‚Äì      ,     .     ,        URL ( id  ..).           . ,     id 173921938   /inbox/email/173921938,     - '/inbox/email/:id'. 
 
     /inbox/email/173921938, Angular       ,    /inbox/email/902827312. 
 
    :

9.4 API
API , . ‚Äì return, . , .

function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

.

function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

9.4.1 restrict
restrict ‚Äì . , 'A'. 'E', ‚Äì 'M' ‚Äì 'C'.

9.4.2 replace
. <some-directive></some-directive> replace: true, .

9.4.3 scope
$scope , . $scope , .

9.4.4 controllerAs
, . controllerAs: 'something', something.myMethod()

9.4.5 controller
. MainCtrl , controller: 'MainCtrl'. controller: function () {}. ViewModel .

9.4.6 link
link , DOM, - -, Angular.

DOM, link. $scope, $element $attrs, DOM, {{ }}. link , Angular.

9.5
, ‚Äúemail‚Äù, To, Subject Message.

<compose-email> , . DOM , , . .

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

composeEmail , HTML. , Angular , composeEmail <compose-email></compose-email>

10
, - . , , , . .

DOM | , Angular, $filter, JavaScript HTML.

HTML :

{{ filter_expression | filter : expression : comparator }}

JavaScript :

$filter('filter')(array, expression, comparator);

HTML. .

10.1
, Angular . $scope.timeNow = new Date().getTime():

<p> : {{ timeNow | date:'dd-MM-yyyy' }} </p>

10.2 JSON
JSON JavaScript JSON. DOM . JSON </code> <source lang="html"> <pre> {{ myObject | json }}


10.3 limitTo orderBy
‚Äì . ?

limitTo , ‚Äì ng-repeat.

<ul> <li ng-repeat="user in users | limitTo:10"> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul>

10 . limitTo ng-repeat.

orderBy , . :

{ name: 'Todd Motto', }

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat=" user in users | orderBy:'name' "> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul>

.

11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

12.1 $routeParams
$routeParams URL , . , id :id

, $routeParams:

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

‚Äì , - . , . , .

<input type="text" ng-model="user.name" placeholder=" "> <button ng-disabled="!user.name.length"> </button>

user.name.length true, . , .

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

, ‚Äúemail‚Äù, To, Subject Message.

<compose-email> , . DOM , , . .

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

composeEmail , HTML. , Angular , composeEmail <compose-email></compose-email>

10
, - . , , , . .

DOM | , Angular, $filter, JavaScript HTML.

HTML :

{{ filter_expression | filter : expression : comparator }}

JavaScript :

$filter('filter')(array, expression, comparator);

HTML. .

10.1
, Angular . $scope.timeNow = new Date().getTime():

<p> : {{ timeNow | date:'dd-MM-yyyy' }} </p>

10.2 JSON
JSON JavaScript JSON. DOM . JSON </code> <source lang="html"> <pre> {{ myObject | json }}


10.3 limitTo orderBy
‚Äì . ?

limitTo , ‚Äì ng-repeat.

<ul> <li ng-repeat="user in users | limitTo:10"> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul>

10 . limitTo ng-repeat.

orderBy , . :

{ name: 'Todd Motto', }

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat=" user in users | orderBy:'name' "> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul>

.

11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

12.1 $routeParams
$routeParams URL , . , id :id

, $routeParams:

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);
, .

:

{ templateUrl: 'items.html' }

Angular DOM id, , HTTP GET.

text/ng-template, , JavaScript. , . template, . , Angular , ng-include ng-view. Angular GET- .

9.4 API
API , . ‚Äì return, . , .

function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

.

function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

9.4.1 restrict
restrict ‚Äì . , 'A'. 'E', ‚Äì 'M' ‚Äì 'C'.

9.4.2 replace
. <some-directive></some-directive> replace: true, .

9.4.3 scope
$scope , . $scope , .

9.4.4 controllerAs
, . controllerAs: 'something', something.myMethod()

9.4.5 controller
. MainCtrl , controller: 'MainCtrl'. controller: function () {}. ViewModel .

9.4.6 link
link , DOM, - -, Angular.

DOM, link. $scope, $element $attrs, DOM, {{ }}. link , Angular.

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

12.1 $routeParams
$routeParams URL , . , id :id

, $routeParams:

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

, , DOM .

, .

<form name="myForm"></form>

Angular , , , ..

13.1 HTML5
HTML5 pattern, . Angular . , Angular , required ng-required, . Angular.

13.2 $pristine
Angular $pristine ‚Äì , . Angular ng-pristine , .

13.4 $dirty
pristine ‚Äì , . ng-dirty, ng-pristine . $pristine .

13.5 $valid
$valid. , ng-required, , ng-valid

13.6 $invalid
valid. , $invalid ‚Äì ng-invalid. , .

13.7
‚Äì , - . , . , .

<input type="text" ng-model="user.name" placeholder=" "> <button ng-disabled="!user.name.length"> </button>

user.name.length true, . , .

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl); 
  ,    . 
 
  : 
 
 { templateUrl: 'items.html' } 
 
 Angular    DOM     id,    ,     HTTP GET. 
 
 <script type="text/ng-template" id="/hello.html"> <div> <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> </div> </script> 
 
       text/ng-template,      ,  JavaScript.        ,      .     template,     .   , Angular  ,       ng-include  ng-view.    Angular  GET-   . 
 
      $templateCache     . 
 
 9.4 API  
    API ,      .   ‚Äì return,  .  ,     . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
       . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
 9.4.1 restrict 
    restrict ‚Äì     .        ,    'A'.         'E',  ‚Äì 'M'    ‚Äì 'C'. 
 
 9.4.2 replace 
    .    <some-directive></some-directive>   replace: true,          . 
 
 9.4.3 scope 
   $scope    ,    .    $scope    ,    . 
 
 9.4.4 controllerAs 
     ,      .    controllerAs: 'something',          something.myMethod() 
 
 9.4.5 controller 
      .  MainCtrl  ,     controller: 'MainCtrl'.            controller: function () {}.         ViewModel    . 
 
 9.4.6 link 
  link   ,       DOM,     -      -,    Angular. 
 
      DOM,      link.     $scope,    $element   $attrs,     DOM,    {{ }}.  link    ,       Angular. 
 
 9.5   
     ,     ‚Äúemail‚Äù,     To, Subject  Message. 
 
    <compose-email> ,      .       DOM ,        ,      .   . 
 
 function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail); 
 
      composeEmail   ,     HTML. ,  Angular    ,  composeEmail   <compose-email></compose-email>

        ,   - .     ,      ,   ,     .     .

 {{ filter_expression | filter : expression : comparator }} 
 
 JavaScript : 
 
 $filter('filter')(array, expression, comparator); 
 
       HTML.    . 
 
 10.1   
    ,  Angular   .        $scope.timeNow = new Date().getTime():

 10.2  JSON 
   JSON   JavaScript   JSON.        DOM  .      JSON   </code> <source lang="html"> <pre> {{ myObject | json }} 
 
 
 10.3 limitTo  orderBy 
     ‚Äì     .      ? 
 
 limitTo   ,    ‚Äì     ng-repeat. 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="user in users | limitTo:10"> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul> 
 
     10 .     limitTo  ng-repeat. 
 
 orderBy    ,      .       : 
 
 { name: 'Todd Motto', } 
 
        : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat=" user in users | orderBy:'name' "> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul> 
 
        .

 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
       : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
 something     : 
 
 function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { //     "items",   "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA); 
 
 11.3   
 
      .filter(),     ,     .   ,      this.namesStartingWithA,        ,   .      controllerAs. 
 function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl); 
 
     DOM  : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

      Angular,      :   Angular    .     ,    ,          URL.     ngRoute

    .  Angular     controller  controllerAs.

 14     $http  $resource 
      Angular   API, $http  $resource.      ,     $digest,      . 
 
 14.1 $http 
     jQuery $.ajax,      .  $http       .        $http({...}),       $http.get(...).  $http   API ,     $q. 
 
       ,         .   HTTP- GET: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { }); 
 
       ,     ,   .       ,     : 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { }); 
 
         .then(),   Angular: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { //  }, function (reason) { //  }); 
 
     jQuery, Angular   $http  $scope.$apply(),          . 
 
 14.2 $resource 
   $http    ngResource.    API $resource,   CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource  ,          REST. 
 
 function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService); 
 
       Movies          . 
 
 function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); //    movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

9.4 API
API , . ‚Äì return, . , .

function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

.

function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

9.4.1 restrict
restrict ‚Äì . , 'A'. 'E', ‚Äì 'M' ‚Äì 'C'.

9.4.2 replace
. <some-directive></some-directive> replace: true, .

9.4.3 scope
$scope , . $scope , .

9.4.4 controllerAs
, . controllerAs: 'something', something.myMethod()

9.4.5 controller
. MainCtrl , controller: 'MainCtrl'. controller: function () {}. ViewModel .

9.4.6 link
link , DOM, - -, Angular.

DOM, link. $scope, $element $attrs, DOM, {{ }}. link , Angular.

9.5
, ‚Äúemail‚Äù, To, Subject Message.

<compose-email> , . DOM , , . .

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

composeEmail , HTML. , Angular , composeEmail <compose-email></compose-email>

11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

14.1 $http

, . HTTP- GET:

, , . , :

.then(), Angular:

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

, .

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);
, .

:

{ templateUrl: 'items.html' }

text/ng-template, , JavaScript. , . template, . , Angular , ng-include ng-view. Angular GET- .

$templateCache .

9.4 API
API , . ‚Äì return, . , .

function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

.

function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

9.4.1 restrict
restrict ‚Äì . , 'A'. 'E', ‚Äì 'M' ‚Äì 'C'.

9.4.2 replace
. <some-directive></some-directive> replace: true, .

9.4.3 scope
$scope , . $scope , .

9.4.4 controllerAs
, . controllerAs: 'something', something.myMethod()

9.4.5 controller
. MainCtrl , controller: 'MainCtrl'. controller: function () {}. ViewModel .

9.4.6 link
link , DOM, - -, Angular.

DOM, link. $scope, $element $attrs, DOM, {{ }}. link , Angular.

9.5
, ‚Äúemail‚Äù, To, Subject Message.

<compose-email> , . DOM , , . .

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

composeEmail , HTML. , Angular , composeEmail <compose-email></compose-email>

‚Äì . ?

11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

 14     $http  $resource 
      Angular   API, $http  $resource.      ,     $digest,      . 
 
 14.1 $http 
     jQuery $.ajax,      .  $http       .        $http({...}),       $http.get(...).  $http   API ,     $q. 
 
       ,         .   HTTP- GET: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { }); 
 
       ,     ,   .       ,     : 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { }); 
 
         .then(),   Angular: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { //  }, function (reason) { //  }); 
 
     jQuery, Angular   $http  $scope.$apply(),          . 
 
 14.2 $resource 
   $http    ngResource.    API $resource,   CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource  ,          REST. 
 
 function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService); 
 
       Movies          .

, .

:

{ templateUrl: 'items.html' }

Angular DOM id, , HTTP GET.

<script type="text/ng-template" id="/hello.html"> <div> <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> </div> </script>

text/ng-template, , JavaScript. , . template, . , Angular , ng-include ng-view. Angular GET- .

$templateCache .

9.4 API
API , . ‚Äì return, . , .

function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

.

function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

9.4.1 restrict
restrict ‚Äì . , 'A'. 'E', ‚Äì 'M' ‚Äì 'C'.

9.4.2 replace
. <some-directive></some-directive> replace: true, .

9.4.3 scope
$scope , . $scope , .

9.4.4 controllerAs
, . controllerAs: 'something', something.myMethod()

9.4.5 controller
. MainCtrl , controller: 'MainCtrl'. controller: function () {}. ViewModel .

9.4.6 link
link , DOM, - -, Angular.

DOM, link. $scope, $element $attrs, DOM, {{ }}. link , Angular.

9.5
, ‚Äúemail‚Äù, To, Subject Message.

<compose-email> , . DOM , , . .

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

composeEmail , HTML. , Angular , composeEmail <compose-email></compose-email>

, Angular . $scope.timeNow = new Date().getTime():

10.3 limitTo orderBy
‚Äì . ?

limitTo , ‚Äì ng-repeat.

<ul> <li ng-repeat="user in users | limitTo:10"> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul>

{ name: 'Todd Motto', }

:

11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

12.1 $routeParams
$routeParams URL , . , id :id

, $routeParams:

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

14 $http $resource

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

 function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
       . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
 9.4.1 restrict 
    restrict ‚Äì     .        ,    'A'.         'E',  ‚Äì 'M'    ‚Äì 'C'. 
 
 9.4.2 replace 
    .    <some-directive></some-directive>   replace: true,          . 
 
 9.4.3 scope 
   $scope    ,    .    $scope    ,    . 
 
 9.4.4 controllerAs 
     ,      .    controllerAs: 'something',          something.myMethod() 
 
 9.4.5 controller 
      .  MainCtrl  ,     controller: 'MainCtrl'.            controller: function () {}.         ViewModel    . 
 
 9.4.6 link 
  link   ,       DOM,     -      -,    Angular. 
 
      DOM,      link.     $scope,    $element   $attrs,     DOM,    {{ }}.  link    ,       Angular. 
 
 9.5   
     ,     ‚Äúemail‚Äù,     To, Subject  Message.

 function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

 11   
        .     Angular  API.        .         $digest. 
 
 11.1    
   ,    .     .filter().         . 
 
   ,    . 
 
 function myFilter () { return function () { //   }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter); 
 
       .          (  Angular    ). 
 
 function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase); 
 
 item     .     ,  : 
 
 <p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p> 
 
 11.2    
         .   ,       . ,   ,   'A'. 
 
 function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA); 
 
    ng-repeat: 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
       : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
 something     : 
 
 function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { //     "items",   "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA); 
 
 11.3   
 
      .filter(),     ,     .   ,      this.namesStartingWithA,        ,   .      controllerAs. 
 function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl); 
 
     DOM  : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
 12    $routeProvider 
      Angular,      :   Angular    .     ,    ,          URL.     ngRoute 
 
 angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]); 
 
     ,    ,  $routeProvider      .config().        .when(). 
 
 ,         ‚Äì    ¬´¬ª /inbox ,     .     .when()  ,   URL.   ‚Äì    .    .otherwise(),     . 
 
 function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router); 
 
       ,      . ,    inbox.html. 
 
 $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); 
 
    .  Angular     controller  controllerAs. 
 
 $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); 
 
  ,       ‚Äì      ,     .     ,        URL ( id  ..).           . ,     id 173921938   /inbox/email/173921938,     - '/inbox/email/:id'. 
 
     /inbox/email/173921938, Angular       ,    /inbox/email/902827312. 
 
    : 
 
 function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router); 
 
    ,  .    ,       .    ng-view.    - : 
 
 <div ng-view></div>

 14     $http  $resource 
      Angular   API, $http  $resource.      ,     $digest,      . 
 
 14.1 $http 
     jQuery $.ajax,      .  $http       .        $http({...}),       $http.get(...).  $http   API ,     $q. 
 
       ,         .   HTTP- GET: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { }); 
 
       ,     ,   .       ,     : 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { }); 
 
         .then(),   Angular: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { //  }, function (reason) { //  }); 
 
     jQuery, Angular   $http  $scope.$apply(),          . 
 
 14.2 $resource 
   $http    ngResource.    API $resource,   CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource  ,          REST. 
 
 function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService); 
 
       Movies          . 
 
 function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); //    movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

, . .filter(). .

, .

. ( Angular ).

item . , :

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);
, .

10
, - . , , , . .

DOM | , Angular, $filter, JavaScript HTML.

HTML :

{{ filter_expression | filter : expression : comparator }}

JavaScript :

$filter('filter')(array, expression, comparator);

HTML. .

10.1
, Angular . $scope.timeNow = new Date().getTime():

<p> : {{ timeNow | date:'dd-MM-yyyy' }} </p>

10.2 JSON
JSON JavaScript JSON. DOM . JSON </code> <source lang="html"> <pre> {{ myObject | json }}


10.3 limitTo orderBy
‚Äì . ?

limitTo , ‚Äì ng-repeat.

<ul> <li ng-repeat="user in users | limitTo:10"> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul>

10 . limitTo ng-repeat.

orderBy , . :

{ name: 'Todd Motto', }

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat=" user in users | orderBy:'name' "> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul>

11
. Angular API. . $digest.

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

function myFilter () { return function () { // }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter);

. ( Angular ).

function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase);

item . , :

<p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p>

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

12.1 $routeParams
$routeParams URL , . , id :id

, $routeParams:

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

 9.4 API  
    API ,      .   ‚Äì return,  .  ,     . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
       . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
 9.4.1 restrict 
    restrict ‚Äì     .        ,    'A'.         'E',  ‚Äì 'M'    ‚Äì 'C'. 
 
 9.4.2 replace 
    .    <some-directive></some-directive>   replace: true,          . 
 
 9.4.3 scope 
   $scope    ,    .    $scope    ,    . 
 
 9.4.4 controllerAs 
     ,      .    controllerAs: 'something',          something.myMethod() 
 
 9.4.5 controller 
      .  MainCtrl  ,     controller: 'MainCtrl'.            controller: function () {}.         ViewModel    . 
 
 9.4.6 link 
  link   ,       DOM,     -      -,    Angular. 
 
      DOM,      link.     $scope,    $element   $attrs,     DOM,    {{ }}.  link    ,       Angular. 
 
 9.5   
     ,     ‚Äúemail‚Äù,     To, Subject  Message. 
 
    <compose-email> ,      .       DOM ,        ,      .   . 
 
 function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail); 
 
      composeEmail   ,     HTML. ,  Angular    ,  composeEmail   <compose-email></compose-email>

 <ul> <li ng-repeat=" user in users | orderBy:'name' "> {{ user.name }} </li> </ul> 
 
        . 
 
 11   
        .     Angular  API.        .         $digest. 
 
 11.1    
   ,    .     .filter().         . 
 
   ,    . 
 
 function myFilter () { return function () { //   }; } angular .module('app') .filter('myFilter', myFilter); 
 
       .          (  Angular    ). 
 
 function toLowercase () { return function (item) { return item.toLowerCase(); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('toLowercase', toLowercase); 
 
 item     .     ,  : 
 
 <p>{{ user.name | toLowercase }}</p> 
 
 11.2    
         .   ,       . ,   ,   'A'. 
 
 function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA); 
 
    ng-repeat: 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
       : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
 something     : 
 
 function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { //     "items",   "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA); 
 
 11.3   
 
      .filter(),     ,     .   ,      this.namesStartingWithA,        ,   .      controllerAs. 
 function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl); 
 
     DOM  : 
 
 <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> 
 
 12    $routeProvider 
      Angular,      :   Angular    .     ,    ,          URL.     ngRoute 
 
 angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]); 
 
     ,    ,  $routeProvider      .config().        .when(). 
 
 ,         ‚Äì    ¬´¬ª /inbox ,     .     .when()  ,   URL.   ‚Äì    .    .otherwise(),     . 
 
 function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router); 
 
       ,      . ,    inbox.html. 
 
 $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); 
 
    .  Angular     controller  controllerAs. 
 
 $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); 
 
  ,       ‚Äì      ,     .     ,        URL ( id  ..).           . ,     id 173921938   /inbox/email/173921938,     - '/inbox/email/:id'. 
 
     /inbox/email/173921938, Angular       ,    /inbox/email/902827312. 
 
    : 
 
 function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router); 
 
    ,  .    ,       .    ng-view.    - : 
 
 <div ng-view></div>

 14     $http  $resource 
      Angular   API, $http  $resource.      ,     $digest,      . 
 
 14.1 $http 
     jQuery $.ajax,      .  $http       .        $http({...}),       $http.get(...).  $http   API ,     $q. 
 
       ,         .   HTTP- GET: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { }); 
 
       ,     ,   .       ,     : 
 
 $http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { }); 
 
         .then(),   Angular: 
 
 $http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { //  }, function (reason) { //  }); 
 
     jQuery, Angular   $http  $scope.$apply(),          . 
 
 14.2 $resource 
   $http    ngResource.    API $resource,   CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource  ,          REST. 
 
 function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService); 
 
       Movies          . 
 
 function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); //    movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);
, .

:

{ templateUrl: 'items.html' }

9.4 API
API , . ‚Äì return, . , .

function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

.

function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

9.4.1 restrict
restrict ‚Äì . , 'A'. 'E', ‚Äì 'M' ‚Äì 'C'.

9.4.2 replace
. <some-directive></some-directive> replace: true, .

9.4.3 scope
$scope , . $scope , .

9.4.4 controllerAs
, . controllerAs: 'something', something.myMethod()

9.4.5 controller
. MainCtrl , controller: 'MainCtrl'. controller: function () {}. ViewModel .

9.4.6 link
link , DOM, - -, Angular.

DOM, link. $scope, $element $attrs, DOM, {{ }}. link , Angular.

9.5
, ‚Äúemail‚Äù, To, Subject Message.

<compose-email> , . DOM , , . .

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

composeEmail , HTML. , Angular , composeEmail <compose-email></compose-email>

{{ filter_expression | filter : expression : comparator }}

JavaScript :

$filter('filter')(array, expression, comparator);

11.1
, . .filter(). .

, .

. ( Angular ).

item . , :

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

. Angular controller controllerAs.

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

14.1 $http

, . HTTP- GET:

, , . , :

.then(), Angular:

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

11.2
. , . , , 'A'.

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items) { return items.filter(function (item) { return /$a/i.test(item.name); }); }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

ng-repeat:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

:

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in items | namesStartingWithA:something"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

something :

function namesStartingWithA () { return function (items, something) { // "items", "something" }; } angular .module('app') .filter('namesStartingWithA', namesStartingWithA);

11.3

.filter(), , . , this.namesStartingWithA, , . controllerAs.
function SomeCtrl () { this.namesStartingWithA = function () { }; } angular .module('app') .controller('SomeCtrl', SomeCtrl);

DOM :

<ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items | filter:namesStartingWithA"> {{ item }} </li> </ul>

12 $routeProvider
Angular, : Angular . , , URL. ngRoute

angular .module('app', [ 'ngRoute' ]);

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

, ‚Äì ¬´¬ª /inbox , . .when() , URL. ‚Äì . .otherwise(), .

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

12.1 $routeParams
$routeParams URL , . , id :id

, $routeParams:

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);

 9.4 API  
    API ,      .   ‚Äì return,  .  ,     . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective); 
 
       . 
 
 function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

    restrict ‚Äì     .        ,    'A'.         'E',  ‚Äì 'M'    ‚Äì 'C'.

    .    <some-directive></some-directive>   replace: true,          .

   $scope    ,    .    $scope    ,    .

     ,      .    controllerAs: 'something',          something.myMethod()

, , $routeProvider .config(). .when().

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', {}) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); } angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , inbox.html.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

. Angular controller controllerAs.

$routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' });

, ‚Äì , . , URL ( id ..). . , id 173921938 /inbox/email/173921938, - '/inbox/email/:id'.

/inbox/email/173921938, Angular , /inbox/email/902827312.

:

function router ($routeProvider) { $routeProvider .when('/inbox', { templateUrl: 'views/inbox.html', controller: 'InboxCtrl', controllerAs: 'inbox' }) .when('/inbox/email/:id', { templateUrl: 'views/email.html', controller: 'EmailCtrl', controllerAs: 'email' }) .otherwise({ redirectTo: '/inbox' }); }); angular .module('app') .config(router);

, . , . ng-view. - :

<div ng-view></div>

URL Angular, , . , .

12.1 $routeParams
$routeParams URL , . , id :id

, $routeParams:

function EmailCtrl ($routeParams, EmailService) { // $routeParams { id: 20999851 } EmailService .get($routeParams.id) // .success(function (response) {}) .error(function (reason) {}); } angular .module('app') .('EmailCtrl', EmailCtrl);

14 $http $resource
Angular API, $http $resource. , $digest, .

14.1 $http
jQuery $.ajax, . $http . $http({...}), $http.get(...). $http API , $q.

, . HTTP- GET:

$http.get('/url') .success(function (data, status, headers, config) { }) .error(function (data, status, headers, config) { });

, , . , :

$http.get('/url') .success(function (response) { }) .error(function (reason) { });

.then(), Angular:

$http.get('/url') .then(function (response) { // }, function (reason) { // });

jQuery, Angular $http $scope.$apply(), .

14.2 $resource
$http ngResource. API $resource, CRUD- (create, read, update, delete). $resource , REST.

function MovieService ($resource) { return $resource('/api/movies/:id', { id: '@_id' }, { update: { method: 'PUT' } } ); } angular .module('app') .factory('MovieService', MovieService);

Movies .

function MovieCtrl (MovieService) { var movies = new MovieService(); // movies.update(/* some data */); } angular .module('app') .controller('MovieCtrl', MovieCtrl);
, .

:

{ templateUrl: 'items.html' }

Angular DOM id, , HTTP GET.

<script type="text/ng-template" id="/hello.html"> <div> <ul> <li ng-repeat="item in vm.items"> {{ item }} </li> </ul> </div> </script>

text/ng-template, , JavaScript. , . template, . , Angular , ng-include ng-view. Angular GET- .

$templateCache .

9.4 API
API , . ‚Äì return, . , .

function someDirective () { return { }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

.

function someDirective () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'something', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="some-directive">', 'My directive!', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .directive('someDirective', someDirective);

9.4.1 restrict
restrict ‚Äì . , 'A'. 'E', ‚Äì 'M' ‚Äì 'C'.

9.4.2 replace
. <some-directive></some-directive> replace: true, .

9.4.3 scope
$scope , . $scope , .

9.4.4 controllerAs
, . controllerAs: 'something', something.myMethod()

9.4.5 controller
. MainCtrl , controller: 'MainCtrl'. controller: function () {}. ViewModel .

9.4.6 link
link , DOM, - -, Angular.

DOM, link. $scope, $element $attrs, DOM, {{ }}. link , Angular.

9.5
, ‚Äúemail‚Äù, To, Subject Message.

<compose-email> , . DOM , , . .

function composeEmail () { return { restrict: 'EA', replace: true, scope: true, controllerAs: 'compose', controller: function () { }, link: function ($scope, $element, $attrs) { }, template: [ '<div class="compose-email">', '<input type="text" placeholder="To..." ng-model="compose.to">', '<input type="text" placeholder="Subject..." ng-model="compose.subject">', '<textarea placeholder="Message..." ng-model="compose.message"></textarea>', '</div>' ].join('') }; } angular .module('app') .controller('composeEmail', composeEmail);

composeEmail , HTML. , Angular , composeEmail <compose-email></compose-email>

‚Äì . ?
